statements: UPSERT INTO artificial_intelligence (id, name, description) VALUES (1, 'Machine Learning', 'AI application in predicting outcomes') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = EXCLUDED.name, description = EXCLUDED.description;

UPSERT INTO neural_networks (id, name, layers, activation_function) VALUES (1, 'Deep Learning', 5, 'ReLU') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = EXCLUDED.name, layers = EXCLUDED.layers, activation_function = EXCLUDED.activation_function;

UPSERT INTO neural_networks (id, name, layers, activation_function) VALUES (2, 'Convolutional Neural Network', 10, 'Sigmoid') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = EXCLUDED.name, layers = EXCLUDED.layers, activation_function = EXCLUDED.activation_function;

UPSERT INTO ai_models (id, model_name, algorithm, accuracy, created_at) VALUES ('1', 'Model A', 'Regression', 0.85, '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET model_name = 'Model A', algorithm = 'Regression', accuracy = 0.85, created_at = '2022-01-01';

UPSERT INTO ai_datasets (id, dataset_name, data_type, size, created_at) VALUES ('1', 'Dataset X', 'Image', 1000, '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET dataset_name = 'Dataset X', data_type = 'Image', size = 1000, created_at = '2022-01-01';

UPSERT INTO ai_models (id, model_name, algorithm, accuracy, created_at) VALUES ('2', 'Model B', 'Classification', 0.92, '2022-01-02') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET model_name = 'Model B', algorithm = 'Classification', accuracy = 0.92, created_at = '2022-01-02';

INSERT INTO AI_models (id, model_name, model_type, model_accuracy) VALUES ('1', 'Model A', 'Regression', 0.95) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET model_name = 'Model A', model_type = 'Regression', model_accuracy = 0.95;

INSERT INTO AI_datasets (id, dataset_name, dataset_size, dataset_link) VALUES ('1', 'Dataset 1', 1000, 'http://example.com/dataset1') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET dataset_name = 'Dataset 1', dataset_size = 1000, dataset_link = 'http://example.com/dataset1';
INSERT INTO AI_users (id, username, email, role) VALUES ('1', 'user1', 'user1@example.com', 'admin') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET username = 'user1', email = 'user1@example.com', role = 'admin';

UPSERT INTO AI_Companies (company_id, company_name, industry, location) VALUES (1, 'Company A', 'Tech', 'San Francisco') ON CONFLICT (company_id) DO UPDATE SET company_name = EXCLUDED.company_name, industry = EXCLUDED.industry, location = EXCLUDED.location;

UPSERT INTO AI_Research (research_id, topic, researcher, publication_date) VALUES (1, 'AI Ethics', 'John Doe', '2022-10-01') ON CONFLICT (research_id) DO UPDATE SET topic = EXCLUDED.topic, researcher = EXCLUDED.researcher, publication_date = EXCLUDED.publication_date;

UPSERT INTO AI_Products (product_id, product_name, description, company_id) VALUES (1, 'Product X', 'An AI-powered solution', 1) ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET product_name = EXCLUDED.product_name, description = EXCLUDED.description, company_id = EXCLUDED.company_id;

UPSERT INTO ai_research_papers (id, title, author, abstract, publication_date) VALUES (1, 'Paper1', 'John Doe', 'This is the abstract of Paper1', '2022-01-01') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = 'Paper1 Updated';

UPSERT INTO ai_projects (id, project_name, description, start_date, end_date) VALUES (1, 'Project1', 'Description of Project1', '2022-01-01', '2022-02-01') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE project_name = 'Project1 Updated';

UPSERT INTO ai_datasets (id, dataset_name, description, size_mb, created_date) VALUES (1, 'Dataset1', 'Description of Dataset1', 100, '2022-01-01') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dataset_name = 'Dataset1 Updated';
